document_title: Benign goiter: Causes, diagnosis, treatment and prevention
subsection_content:
Benign goiter (medically called goiter) is a condition in which thyroid cells grow excessively or unevenly, with signs of increased thyroid size and abnormal swelling. This is one of the common types of thyroid disorders, which can be treated with medication and surgery. (first)
Benign goiter is a common thyroid disorder that can be treated with medication and surgery.
subsection_title: buou co lanh tinh.json. What is a benign goiter?
